entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY ENDED, Sioux Narrows
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:41 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.0°C

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
